definition: to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: It produces musicals too, that is, films with music.
sentences.chinese: 它还摄制音乐片，即以音乐为主的影片。

sentences.english: Obviously, this was a dramatization, since an entire cam crew went along.
sentences.chinese: 整个摄制组都去了，所以这报道显然具有戏剧性。

sentences.english: This belongs among the best films produced since liberation.
sentences.chinese: 这是解放以来摄制的最优秀的影片之一。

sentences.english: The production unit of the Beijing Film Studio will leave Beijing for other parts of the country to film the exterior next month.
sentences.chinese: 北京电影制片厂摄制组下个月去外地拍外景。

sentences.english: The TV crew looked stressed and agitated.
sentences.chinese: 电视摄制组看起来既紧张又激动。

sentences.english: Batman was also filmed standing atop the sleek edifice last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年拍摄的《蝙蝠侠》也是在这栋大厦上摄制的。

sentences.english: At first they start rolling the camera, they start filming.
sentences.chinese: 首先先开动摄像机摄制各部门开始拍摄一场戏。

sentences.english: Chinese cinema originates from Dingjun Hill which was produced in 1905.
sentences.chinese: 中国电影发轫于1905年摄制的《定军山》。

sentences.english: Travel Expert went to Vietnam with i-Cable's crew.
sentences.chinese: 专业旅运随摄制队前往越南拍摄，访寻美食。

sentences.english: A film crew was there from the Netherlands to shoot a documentary.
sentences.chinese: 有一个荷兰来的摄制队正在那儿拍纪录片。

sentences.english: The movie 'Artist Zhu Qizhan' was completed by Shanghai Animation Film Studio.
sentences.chinese: 电影《画家朱屺瞻》由上海美术电影制片厂摄制完成。

sentences.english: Benidick : Next week, I will lead a production unit to A-Ba in SiChuan province.
sentences.chinese: 下周一我将带领一个摄制组驾车前往四川阿坝。

sentences.english: The film was made way back in1929.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片是早在一九二九年就摄制的。

sentences.english: The fiction story won't film well.
sentences.chinese: 这小说不适于摄制成电影。

sentences.english: The scientists photomapped the skies by using a telescopic camera.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们用望远镜照相机摄制天空星球图。

sentences.english: It's like being at filmmaking gym.
sentences.chinese: 它像在电影摄制建身房。

definition: variant of 紀錄片|纪录片[ji4 lu4 pian4]
to start shooting (a film)/to invest in (a movie)/to put (sth) up for auction
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
to choose a location/to frame a shot (for filming, photography etc)
